pages.text: 26|112|Kare (nufu) wa itta. `Kare-ra ga okonatte iru koto ni tsuite, watashi ga nani o shirimashou ka.
26|113|Kare-ra no seisan wa, tada watashi no omo ni zokusuru nodesu. Moshi anata gataga rikai surunaraba.
26|114|Mata watashi wa, shinko suru mono-tachi o oiharaimasen.
26|115|Watashi wa komeina hitori no keikoku-sha ni suginai nodesu.'
26|116|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata ga tomenainara, nufu yo, kanarazu ishi-uchi ni sa rerudeshou.'
26|117|Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, hontoni watashi no min wa watashi o uso-tsukidearu to moshimasu.
26|118|Sorede watashi to kare-ra no ma o, shikkari o sabaki kudasare, watashi to, watashi to issho no shinja-tachi o sukutte kudasai.'
26|119|Sokode ware wa kare to, kare to issho no mono-tachi o, mansai shita fune no naka ni sukutte yatta.
26|120|Sorekara ware wa ato ni nokotta-sha-tachi o obore saseta.
26|121|Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai.
26|122|Hontoni anata no shu, kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru.
26|123|Ado (no min) mo, shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita.
26|124|Kare-ra no doho no fudo ga kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokose. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.
26|125|Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|126|Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|127|Mata watashi wa, kono koto de anata gata ni hoshu o motomemasen. Watashi e no hoshu wa, tada ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|128|Anata gata wa kochi to iu kochi ni itazura ni ishibumi o tateru nodesu ka.
26|129|Mata anata gata wa (eien ni) sumou to shite, kengona koro o tateru nodesu ka.
26|130|Anata gata wa boryoku o fuu toki, bogyaku-sha no yo ni furumau nodesu ka.
26|131|Arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|132|Anata gata ga shiru hodo no mono o, sadzuke rareru-kata o osore nasai.
26|133|Kare wa kazukazu no kachiku to shison o, anata gata ni sadzuke rare,
26|134|mata kaju-en ya izumi o mo sadzuke rareta.
26|135|Watashi wa anata gata ni kuwae rareru idaina hi no chobatsu o hontoni osoreru.'
26|136|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata ga sekkyo shite mo sekkyo shinakute mo, watashi-tachi ni totte wa onaji kotodesu.
